An incredible powerful magical vortex core, holding the souls of many fallen.

Use a Soul Diffuser to release it's power
Crafting ingredient used to craft special vault rocks or vault seals.

This capstone will <#FF8900>scrap all <gray>non <yellow>legendary<gray> gear found in chests, leaving only the outcome resources.

Use in the Crystal Workbench as a capstone, making the crystal <#a64141>unmodifiable <gray>and adding the <#A3E2F5>Looters Dream<gray>. This will completely negate all trapped chances from ever occurring even when on a crystal with the Trapped Modifier.
Use in the Crystal Workbench as a capstone, making the crystal <#a64141>unmodifiable and adding this god's favour
